data.rationale:
It seems that people don't know that SpeedyCGI is in fact a
    persistent perl interpreter. In an attempt to fix this, I asked the
    SpeedyCGI users their opinion, and the best response was to rename
    it or add an alias. I picked PersistentPerl since it seems to convey
    that this is a general purpose persistent Perl interpreter.

    The plan is to keep SpeedyCGI and PersistentPerl based on the same
    code for a while, then if it all works out, transition to a single
    name only.
